name: MUD Map

screenshots.caption: a more complex world in overview / small tiles mode (mudmap v1.4.45)
a very simple world, on this screnshot the mouse pointer is missing, it pointed to the "green path" place above the grey box (mudmap v1.4.45)
the place list, click on an entry to find the place (mudmap v1.2)

short_description:
MUD Map helps users of MUDs, MUSHs, text adventures and similar games at creating maps of the virtual worlds and to keep an overview over places, ways, dangerous areas,...

MUD Map v2 is a entirely new rewrite of MUD Map 1.x in Java. It is compatible to MUD Map v1 and almost all of its features (and also a few new features) are implemented. More information about MUD Map v2 can be found on GitHub: https://github.com/Neop/mudmap2
summary: A tool to create and organize user side maps for text-based games
